carbon copy.translation[0].definitions[0: a copy, especially of something that has been typed using carbon paper
carbon copy.translation[0].definitions[1: someone or something that is very similar to another person or thing
The robbery is a carbon copy of one that took place last year.
carbon copy.translation[1].definitions[0: a copy of a document made using carbon paper
carbon copy.translation[1].definitions[1: if something is a carbon copy of something else, it is very similar
carbon copy.translation[1].definitions[2: a copy of an email message
